DOC.brief_summary: The Outcome of Multi-Disciplinary, Structured Rehabilitation of Older People in a District Inpatient Rehabilitation Centre is better than in a Standard Primary Health Care Rehabilitation Programme in Short Term Beds in Nursing Homes.
DOC.brief_title: Outcome of Rehabilitation of Older People in Primary Health Care
